welcome to 1776 welcome to the fight
today we hear a cry from Hong Kong they
raise American flags not an effort to
degrade the United States but to sing
our national anthem for the purpose it
was written freedom they are an example
for all of us America don't go down
without a fight we've been lied to and
betrayed by our elected officials and
agencies it's time to wake up we must
start acting
don't let treason become simply a
backyard discussion we will lose this
Republic if we fail to act we must stop
the infighting and stand together as
Americans to halt the loss of our rights
and freedoms as a nation we are being
led down a path to Civil War it is
crucial that we see beyond such rhetoric
and lies we should instead view our
position as we did during the
Revolutionary War of 1776 everyday by
covert and psychological means we are
further divided against each other in
the effort to dissolve our god-given
rights because divided we fall they want
the once proud lion to sit quietly in
its cage I speak to all Americans and to
all citizens of the world who value
freedom we cannot be the people who gave
up too distracted too blinded to the
truth
President Kennedy gave His life in his
attempt to protect us from these very
plans don't let that be in vain no land
rights no rights to protect your family
and by 2030 and UN mandate citizens of
the United Nations not America the UN is
already coming into the state of Utah we
must all agree to stop this insanity
before we lose everything our fathers
and mothers fought to give us think
about what our children will inherit we
must now become the great generation the
generation that wakes up and unites
motivated to peaceful action because we
will no longer accept the plans put in
place to destroy our great nation let us
not be defined but what we can do
but empowered by what we should do
